item.title: Sebastian Stan & Wyatt Russell Reveal Cut Moment From The Thunderbolts* Post-Credits Scene
item.description: Sebastian Stan and Wyatt Russell reveal a cut moment from the big Thunderbolts* post-credits scene and their thoughts on the decision to remove it.

item.title: “It’s Not A Continuation”: John Wick 5 Won’t Involve The High Table, Early Story Update Reveals
item.description: Chad Stahelski reveals some early insight into John Wick 5's story, explaining how Keanu Reeves' assassin's tale will move the character forward.

item.title: How The Surfer Director Combined The Thriller Movie's Dreamlike Atmosphere With Nicolas Cage's Larger-Than-Life Presence
item.description: The Surfer director Lorcan Finnegan talks his thriller, creating its dreamlike atmosphere and how it aligned with Nicolas Cage's character.
